meanings.sent1: The noncommutativities of the mathematical operations confused the students.
meanings.sent2: Understanding noncommutativities in algebra is essential for solving certain equations.
meanings.sent3: The noncommutativities of the puzzle pieces made it impossible to fit them together.
meanings.sent4: In the world of abstract algebra, noncommutativities can be like trying to mix oil and water.
meanings.sent5: The noncommutativities of the traffic flow in the city created chaos during rush hour.

meanings.definition: The property of not being commutative
meanings.sent1: Mathematicians study the noncommutativities of different mathematical structures.
meanings.sent2: The noncommutativities of matrix multiplication are well-known in linear algebra.
meanings.sent3: The noncommutativities of the jigsaw puzzle pieces led to an unexpected pattern.
meanings.sent4: The noncommutativities of language and culture can sometimes lead to misunderstandings.
meanings.sent5: The noncommutativities of the dance routine added an interesting twist to the performance.
